title.narrative: Bangladesh Strengthening PFM Program to Enable Service Delivery

description.narrative: The Program Development Objective (PDO) is to improve fiscal forecasting, budget preparation and execution, financial reporting and transparency to enable better resource availability for service delivery in selected Ministries, Departments, and Agencies.
